name: Castle Defence
description:
Hello everybody.

Just want to share with you my first game in unity (2D game, created with c#). PC-only, operating system is windows.
Coding and learning took about 2 months, game still has some bugs (hope you can't find any of them:)). It looks like "Tower defence" type of games with sprites from old "Might and Magic 2" PC-game.

According of my low gamedev exp., I recommend to use 1280x1024 screen resolution while play, because some canvas elements can't be shown correctly.

Criticism and comments are welcome :)

Playtime: ~5 mins.
